compatibility.notes: CERN-OHL-S-2.0 has a strong copyleft nature, meaning that any derivative works must also be licensed under the same terms. Care should be taken when combining with other licenses.

key_requirements: Ensure that all modifications and derived works are licensed under CERN-OHL-S.
Provide access to the Complete Source when distributing the Product.
Maintain compliance with the obligations regarding patent grants and trademark use.
license.name: CERN-OHL-S-2.0
obligations: You must disclose the source of the Covered Source when distributing the Product.
You must include a copy of this license with any distribution of the Product.
You must include copyright notices in all copies or substantial portions of the Product.
You must state any changes made to the Covered Source.
You must license any derivative works under the same CERN-OHL-S license.
